VALUER Type: VALUERSDescription: Highways and Transport

decision_conditions: Condition 6The document advises that the acoustic attenuator as recommended in the Nova Acoustics report is to be installed but there is no evidence that it has been, as required by the condition.Condition 7The document advises that the duct work shall be reduced in diameter to increase efflux and will include a jet cowl. I am satisfied that this will achieve the required terminal velocity but again, these all appear planned works and evidence is required to demonstrate that it has been carried out.Condition 8No details have been submitted to discharge this condition. A carbon filter has been documented but there are no details about its residence time. There are also no details about any fine fliter or ESP. These details are required to demonstrate compliance with the required standard of odour abatement as detailed in the condition.Condition 9 Insufficient information has been provided to demonstrate where waste / recycling would be stored on site in a way that would not pose a Fire Safety Risk.Condition 10Insufficient information has been provided to fully address the requirements of the Condition.
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details required for Condition 6 (acoustic attenuator), 7 (vertical discharge terminal duct), 8 (odour abatement), 9 (waste and recycling facilities), 10 (Fire Safety Strategy) of planning permission 24/00773/FUL (Erection of single storey rear extension to provide covered seating area. Installation of kitchen extraction system. (Retrospective))
